description: General schema for purchase order documents.

fields.name: po_number
fields.description: Purchase order identifier or reference number.

fields.name: po_date
fields.description: Date the purchase order was issued.

fields.name: buyer_name
fields.description: Name of the buyer or purchasing organization.

fields.name: buyer_address
fields.description: Address or contact details of the buyer if present.

fields.name: seller_name
fields.description: Name of the supplier or vendor.

fields.name: seller_address
fields.description: Address or contact details of the supplier if present.

fields.name: line_items
fields.description: List of ordered items. Each may include description, quantity, unit_price, tax, line_total.

fields.name: subtotal
fields.description: Subtotal amount before tax and discounts.

fields.name: tax_amount
fields.description: Total tax amount for the order if present.

fields.name: total_amount
fields.description: Total amount of the purchase order.

fields.name: currency
fields.description: Currency code for monetary amounts (e.g., USD, EUR).
